This time Lunarpine was ready for the blast, he hit the ground and 
the blast sailed over him.

"I know your scent monster, next time I'll be ready for you." He said 
as Deathscythe flew away.

He forced himself to stand and picked up his rifle. He knew he 
wouldn't make it back to the Ark, and with his comm damaged his only 
chance was to get the stasis pod he'd found working.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe::
> 
> DeathScythe growls. The threat of a Maximal army attacking him was 
not too 
> welcome.
> 
> "I'll be back, Maximal," DeathScythe says in the whisper he always 
used, 
> "Next time we see each other, you die."
> 
> He fires another shot at Lunarpine's chest, transforming into his 
hideous 
> beast mode, thrusters emerging as he takes off, heading away from 
Lunarpine.
